Lv1.name: Health Stone
Lv1.discription: This stone could extend your life.

Lv1.name: Magic Stone
Lv1.discription: This stone could let you spout more spells.

Lv2.name: Health Bottle
Lv2.discription: This bottle could extend your life more.

Lv2.name: Magic Bottle
Lv2.discription: This bottle could let you spout more and more spells.

Lv3.name: Health Suit
Lv3.discription: You would hardly die with this suit.

Lv3.name: Magic Suit
Lv3.discription: Spout any spells as you want.

Lv1.name: Wooden Sword
Lv1.discription: This is a wooden sword for rookies.

Lv2.name: Iron Sword
Lv2.discription: This is a iron sword for challengers.

Lv2.name: Ablaze Armour
Lv2.discription: This armour could also used as a mirror.

Lv3.name: Golden Armour
Lv3.discription: Your enemy will be blinded because of this dazzing golden light.
